name: BetterScience
title: Better Science
author: Taehl
description: For both new players and veterans! Improves Science pack recipes to follow a traditional progression curve. Silky-smooth transition through oil. Purple science is harder than just dropping Artifacts in a blender. End-game research is more involved, requiring specialized new types of Advanced science. Overall materials cost of research is kept similar to vanilla. Rocket silo can now be achieved without any fighting. Each feature can be tweaked in config.lua.
